help-file.title: PIPER "UNHOLY-PIPER"
help-file.content:
Blessed with the talent of music, pipers can, with practice, play any instrument. These instruments can invoke magical tunes and songs that act as spells, aiding a party during their adventures. Pipers are a thief/mage/ warrior hybrid by nature, and possess some of the advantages of all of those classes. They are true "Jacks of all Trade" which means they have many skills and spells, but are master of none.
Allowable races: Vampire, Lich, Shadow Beast. Equipment Usage: Like all classes on Duris, Pipers have their own set of equipment they can use. Pipers can use most weapons, and armor, also many magic items.
